modName: All Body Mods compatible Female mannequin
summary: Its a simple replacement of default male to female mannequin.
descriptionHtml:
My other Mod:
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4014]Craftable Helmet to Circlet[/url]

Its a simple replacement of default male to female mannequin.
The mod is compatible with all body mods and also with the default body with no mod.
I personnaly use it and did not encounter any trouble, with mannequin like some player. If you have trouble you did somthing wrong.

Unsinstall:

- Make a clean save outside any house with my mod desactivated.
- go in .../Data/Scripts/ and delete MannequinActivatorSCRIPT.psx

Installation :

- Delete all previous version : (see uninstall above)
- unarchive the esp file and the script folder in your skyrim Data folder
- Use launcher to activate the .esp in your data files.

[size=9][b][u]Version :[/u][/b][/size]

[b][u]2.0 :[/u][/b]

- Complete overhaul of my previous mod.
- Change all default mannequin with custom one each different.

[b][u]2.01 :[/u][/b]

- fix name of markarth house.
- the default mannequin is now a Nord Female so it corrects Darkbrotherhood sanctuary mannequin.
- All Mannequins in houses are Human kind by default.
- Breton mannequin is a copy of Lynly npc.
- High Elf mannequin is a copy of Niranye npc.
- Dark elf mannequin is a copy of Irileth npc.
- Nord mannequin is a copy of Iola Houscarl.
- Redguard mannequin is a copy of Saadia npc.
- little update I made main file an esm to be loaded before all esp files and improve compatibility. Just choose one ESP version or ESM version.

[b][u]3.0 :[/u][/b]

- Complete overhaul of my previous mod with ck.
- Change all default mannequin with custom one each different.
- You can change the race in game.
- Not sure but I think this mod is now compatible with all Hideout or other mods like this.

[b][u]3.1 :[/u][/b]

- Thanks to [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/4669929-kiaraliam/]KiaraLiam[/url] who found that The 3.0 version was only vanilla comatible and
- Fix Hearthfire issues with The Race change.
- Include vanilla and hearthfire FIX ( no more duplicate object/ They will no move any more )
- 2 versions available 1 with race change (no custom face) and 1 without (Custom face available).
- Small Update to add helmarchen hall and Windstad manor mannequin in Mod without the race change option.





Credits:

thanks to Caliente to give me permission to use his meshes.
if you don't have his awesome mod go download it :p
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666

thanks to Khajitsree for his awesome texture improvement.
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2841

And all of you by helping me to fix bug and more.
author: Koryushin
